name: Garden Health Monitor
description: Stationary garden robot that monitors plant health via camera and soil sensors, sending daily Telegram reports using GPT-4o vision
author: green_thumb_alex
use_case: Sits in my raised bed garden and takes photos of plants throughout the day. GPT-4o analyzes leaf color, spots pests, and checks growth progress. Combined with soil moisture and temperature readings, I get a daily Telegram digest with watering recommendations and health alerts.
